    • updateFeasibleVertices

      private void updateFeasibleVertices()
      Update the feasible vertices for the next selection. A vertex is feasible if the additional demand does not exceed the capacity otherwise it will be removed.

    • computeTourLength

      private void computeTourLength()
      Computes the length of the tour.
